name: Diet Pepsi
description: Light. Crisp. Refreshing. With zero sugar, zero calories, and zero carbs.

name: Cherry Pepsi
description: The thrilling burst of unique cherry flavor and a sweet, crisp taste that gives you more to go wild for!

name: MTN Dew
description: Mountain Dew, the original instigator, refreshes with its one of a kind great taste.

name: Orange Crush
description: Crush Orange sends your taste buds into flavor overdrive with refreshingly juicy orange flavor that is 100% caffeine free.

name: Sierra Mist
description: A crisp, refreshing & caffeine free Lemon-Lime flavor soda with real sugar and a splash of real juice.
